text: <@U0261PCRQ>, <@U02618EV1>, <@U02613K0X>: did some digging, no team discount this year on Ironclad gear.

For cold/wet, I've been wearing the Cold Condition Waterproof. They're very warm and water-tight. Vibration Impacts are the pre-rain Fall weather go-tos. Mach-5 Vibration Impacts are it for summer gloves. $32 and they last for-ev-er. I'll bring a set of each in on Monday to check out.
